So it's like a suggestion program rather than a grading program.

It does actually give them a grade and tells them what their grade would be if that was where they stopped right then.

And students didn't really like that very much, and I didn't really get a good sense of what they knew.

And so I really wanted to do more writing and have them do more writing and find out more about them, and so we came up with this idea of trying to be able to incorporate more essay grading into large classes.

Yes.

Yeah.
